name: Legend of Dragon Labyrinth
description:
Hello, brave warrior!
You've probably heard about the treasure of dragons and want to take them for yourself? Well, go into the castle and try to get around his guards!

In this game you are waiting for:
  • classical mechanics Pacman
  • many underground labyrinths
  • a variety of behavior, opponents, dragons
  • a myriad of gold in the award
